name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tweet Detective - AI text detection for X

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check on AI generated posts and tweets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Text Detection for X improves your Twitter experience by identifying and analyzing AI-generated content. Smoothly integrated with your Twitter feed, our extension provides real-time insights into the tweets you read.

Features:
Real-time AI analysis: Detect AI-generated texts within tweets instantly.
User-friendly interface: Integrates naturally with your Twitter feed.

How it works?
1 - Visit the website https://tweetdetective.com and purchase a membership.
2 - Install this add-on in your Chrome browser and refresh the page.
3 - Launch the add-on and enter the API key provided by tweetdetective.com.
4- Navigate to twitter.com and look out for tweets created by artificial intelligence!

For support or feedback, reach out to us at support@tweetdetective.com.
